description: This file defines the NotesListFragment class, which is an Android Fragment responsible for displaying a list of notes using RecyclerView. It handles user interactions such as viewing, editing, and deleting notes, and manages UI updates accordingly.

classes.name: NotesListFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment that displays a list of notes as cards, with options to view, edit, or delete each note. Uses ViewModel to observe data and navigation components for screen transitions.

classes.name: NotesAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView Adapter that manages displaying Note items within the list, handling item interactions.

classes.name: NotesAdapter.NoteVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for the NotesAdapter, responsible for binding Note data to UI components within each item view.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up RecyclerView, Adapter, and observes ViewModel data to update UI.

methods.name: NotesAdapter.submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data set with new notes.

methods.name: NotesAdapter.onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout for each note card.

methods.name: NotesAdapter.getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of notes to display.

methods.name: NotesAdapter.onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds the Note data to the ViewHolder for the given position.

methods.name: NotesAdapter.NoteVH.bind
methods.description: Binds a Note object to the view, setting texts and click listeners.
